channel.title: sfcamp on Vinay Keshava
channel.description: Recent content in sfcamp on Vinay Keshava

item.title: Contributing to Debian
item.description: Debian Debian is a GNU/Linux distribution completely inclinded towards Free Software philosophy, maintained by the community. Before talking about how i started contributing to debian, i would like to talk about the camp organized by FSCI It is an online free mentorship programme organized by Free Software Community of India ,introducing people to Free Software.Ravish introduced me to 2021 FSCI’s camp, and there i got introduced to Debian Packaging through Debian Developers and Debian Maintainers.
